name: Cat-A-Roomba: Alone At Home
description:
Cats are always called jerks for knocking things off the table and making a mess, but you're a very good kitty—it's the Roomba that is breaking everything! You have 3 minutes until your human gets home, and it's up to you to make sure the stupid Roomba picks up all the dirt and doesn't break anything.

How to Play
Using WASD or the arrow keys to move the cat. Block the Roomba from breaking things and guide it to pick up all the dirt.
